item.title: Android kitkat missing things
item.description:
Android kitkat (4.4.2) has tons of features but it lacks the basic feature of sharing contact via SMS. For such a basic functionality, nobody would want to install third party app.

It also doesn’t show contact wise call history, for that too you’ve to rely on third party app.
